html:
2.23.20  11:04 pm   Are there any secret pages on this website?

     yes

      How do I find them?

      you found one of them. it's called the questions page

2.23.20  11:01 pm   Did you quit? Like your last song said?

      my last song didn't say that unless you choose to take it extremely out of context or maybe not even listen to it

2.23.20  10:47 pm   How do you be human?

      impossible. it can't be done

2.23.20  10:11 pm   Why does the questions logo look weird?

      maybe it's too ....... INTERESTING

2.23.20  9:59 pm   theres 2 minutes left of my video left to make and its due tommorow what do i do

      DO IT LIVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!

2.23.20  9:52 pm   does it every annoy you how some people use uppercase letters on this question page?

     you mean, like ..... ME?

      it really ruins the aesthetic

     clearly you have not been reading for very long

2.23.20  9:48 pm   Why do your songs titles on spotify have capitalization? did you do that or did they?

      it's complicated. but it is necessary for it to be that way for the process to go more smoothly and have less 'complications'

2.23.20  9:41 pm   Is a fan having fun when spinning around? 

      no

2.23.20  9:36 pm   do you have a dog

      i just checked, i'm the dog

2.23.20  9:26 pm   What kind of music do you like to unwind to

      terrible/horrible

2.23.20  9:00 pm   What do you like to do when you're not producing songs?

      make videos, to go with the songs

2.23.20  8:49 pm   i want to go to a random question without feeling randy. i don't think randy likes to be touched. is there a way to feel randy and not bother him? if so, what is it?

      it's not a person, but you can go to https://billwurtz.com/questions/random.php

2.23.20  8:37 pm   is love the secret to creativity?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.23.20  8:31 pm   How to fold laundry?

      wear it! it will be folded around the shape of your body

2.23.20  8:22 pm   When will you teach us how to love? 

      right away. although i can't remember if i already have

2.23.20  8:15 pm   have you ever tried translating a song keeping all the original language phonetics in thre?

      no but that sounds like fun. actually what i would prefer to do is just give it a re-write that works just as well in the second language

2.23.20  8:12 pm   do you do LSD?

      no. i don't even know what it looks like

2.23.20  8:10 pm   Hey thanks for doing what you're doing

      you're welcome

2.23.20  7:27 pm   Are you using skillshare to learn 3D design,

     no

      or was the sponsorship just for moneyz?

      you must be thinking of someone else. i have never accepted that sponsorship, nor any of the other sponsorships

2.23.20  7:27 pm   What is originality?

      ~~~YOU DECIDE~~~

2.23.20  7:20 pm   i have no privacy, but i want to make YT videos. i don't have a car, or a room where I can talk. where can i make videos? i need my voice.

      you'll have to just do it quietly, for now. just think back to the days when they had to make videos while hiding from the nazis during the holocaust

2.23.20  7:20 pm   If an evil witch turned you into a pizza topping, which one would you become?

      hold on for a moment. you are not making sense. it would be the evil witch who decides that

2.23.20  7:11 pm   how do i make a movie and get all the theaters to play it?

      i'm not sure. i've been trying to figure that out myself. but, if there is any good news, i can assure you that nowadays most people prefer to watch movies on their own home screen, which will be much easier for people like you and me to deliver to

2.23.20  6:54 pm   If given the chance to create one thing, anything that you could think of, what would you create?

     well, thankfully i am blessed to live in a world where i can create more than 1 thing. but i suppose if it had to be only 1 thing i would choose a thumb tack

      Would you still create it if it destroyed something else in its creation process?

     it depends if the other thing is bigger than a thumb tack

2.23.20  6:41 pm   Is writing on paper anti-tree propaganda?

      not quite

2.23.20  6:34 pm   how do you feel answering all these questions from people you don't know? 

      pretty good

2.23.20  6:19 pm   do you keep a diary?

      sure. i don't call it a 'diary' because that word sounds too much like 'diarrhea', but yes

2.23.20  5:52 pm   just watched your whole reality page within 6 hours. just watching your journey of schedules, and climbing up on vine, and trying to get a grip of all your previously written short songs in 1- very long- ass blasting list, is very interesting and inspiring. what do you feel is the biggest lesson you've gotten out of all the changes and breaks and experiments in the past decade or so of content creating?

     i have gotten a pretty good idea of what works for me and doesn't. the balanced song-selection method was kind of a big deal, i found that somewhere around 2017

      cant wait to see some of the ones you are making recently, in 3 years from now.

2.23.20  5:50 pm   what is your faveorite food?

      rations

2.23.20  5:47 pm   Any ideas or suggestions about getting that country pedal steel slide guitar sound using my keyboard/midi?

      yes, if you set the pitch bend to the right amount, and use the pitch bend wheel, i think you will be amazed at how good it sounds. only thing is you will have to keep re-setting it to match each thing you want to play. but maybe if you set it to 5 or 7 (half steps) then pull the wheel down before playing, then play something and slide up to 0, i think you will have a lot of fun with it

2.23.20  5:46 pm   What are you thinking about?

      small rocks,

2.23.20  5:29 pm   hey just to clarify: under what conditions can i assume that i exist? thanks

      if you are wondering whether you exist

2.23.20  5:26 pm   what is the best board game

      walking on the ground

2.23.20  5:19 pm   Are you going to update this website with extra door knob features soon?

      yes

2.23.20  4:46 pm   how do i become as cool as you?

      just try and be extremely naormal

2.23.20  4:23 pm   how do I get revenge

      the best and sweetest revenge can be found in nature

2.23.20  3:51 pm   Are you yourself?

      oh that would explain a lot

2.23.20  3:43 pm   Hey Bill, I need some advice. I've been playing the piano casually since I was small and now that I'm trying to get into some more "adult" pieces I find that my hands seem to be too small. I can barely stretch an octave without twisting my wrists. Do you have any suggestions on how I can play the pieces I want to play without having to cut out parts of chords? Ps I'm at the age that I know my hands aren't going to get significantly bigger so just waiting for them to grow wouldn't really be a viable solution

      there are many many many ways to play the piano and get perfectly great results out of it. i think you will go far if you start using your own personal wits, and make sure you are not trying to copy someone else's exact hand movements (especially if their hands are different sized from yours)

2.23.20  3:36 pm   Whats your favorite video of yours?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

2.23.20  3:24 pm   I really like "Slow Down". Can you show us an early recording of that song? 

      absolutely but i don't have it on me. please ask again in about 8 days

2.23.20  2:53 pm   do you feel like you can get better at any skill you attempt to develop?

      almost but no

2.23.20  2:51 pm   are you overwhelmed?

      i am whelmed the exact right amount

2.23.20  2:45 pm   which site am i on

      how am i supposed to know

2.23.20  2:36 pm   Hi,steve

     my name is not steve

      how are you?

      pretty good

2.23.20  2:12 pm   how to come up with a good username?

      how about 'admin'

2.23.20  1:48 pm   Any plans in the future?

      yes

2.23.20  1:44 pm   Can fish fly 

      only if properly launched

2.23.20  1:00 pm   Are you learning 3D animating?

      oh that would explain a lot

2.23.20  1:00 pm   do I still exist?

     yes

      I don't remember anymore

     if you are asking if you exist, that means you exist. that's a simple rule i generally go by

2.23.20  12:56 pm   Do you ever get annoyed of your own song during the production process due to having to listen to it 74 jazzillion times?

     yes

      If so, how do you power through that?

      the best solution i know of is to produce songs very quickly
